metadata.dc:author: Levín, Santiago A
metadata.dc:description: The paper has two parts. The first part offers a general presentation of Epistemology and its main currents. The second part explores an analysis of some problems in contemporary psychiatry from an epistemological viewpoint.
metadata.dc:title: Apuntes para un análisis epistemológico de algunos problemas de la psiquiatría contemporánea.
[Notes regarding the epistemological analysis of some problems in contemporary psychiatry].
